𒁔 BÚR bright, break, part, release

𒁑 bulug barley malt
𒁑 = 𒁔 bulug₂ 𒁔 BÚRᵘᵍ bright
𒁑 = 𒉄 bulug₄ 𓋹𓈖𓐍 𓈖:L
𒁑 = 𒉄 nagar “carpenter”
𒁑 = 𒉄 nagar ⋍ Nagel (needle, pin, seal-pin) 바늘 baneul visual!

𒈮 MUG < munk 𓏠 𓈖 𓐍 𓍊 मङ्गल maṅgala 𓅓 𓆓 𓏏 𓆑 𓏏 𓍊 <> ♂ Mars 𒈮 MUG < munk 𓏠 𓈖 𓐍 𓍊 𒈠𒀭𒂵𒊏;𒁑 ma-an-ga-ra "chisel" mangara > mace #maggaru

𒁑 1. chisel
𒁑 2. stake
𒁑 3. boundary ( 𒈮 MUG ≈ 𒈦 ) 𒁑 4. needle, pin, seal-pin

ٻارُ ḇāru 𐌱𐌰𐍂𐌽 barn børn бер ber бала bala ٻال ḇāl Balg bocah putra 𓅭𓇳
